title: Cross body Cable Rows
description: Stand next to the cable and pivot at the hips to bend over at about a 45-degree angle Reach across your body with the hand thatâ€™s farthest from the cable and take a firm grip of the handle Bring the handle across your body without rotating your torso, using mostly your lat muscle After tensing at the peak, allow the cable to pull its way, in a controlled way, back to the starting position
related_exercises: Bent Over Two-Armed Water Bottle Rows
